name: editor-focus-notifier
description: Notifies external tools when entering/leaving the text editor area
author: Akinori Musha

editorFocusNotifier.enable.description: Enable focus state detection and command execution.

editorFocusNotifier.onEnterEditorCommand.description: Shell command to run when entering editor state.

editorFocusNotifier.onEnterTerminalComma.description: Shell command to run when entering terminal state.

editorFocusNotifier.onEnterOtherCommand.description: Shell command to run when entering other state.

commands.title: Editor Focus Notifier: Show Current State

scripts.publish: npm run publish:vsce && npm run publish:ovsx
scripts.publish:vsce: vsce publish --packagePath "$(npm pkg get name version | jq -rs '.[0] | "\(.name)-\(.version).vsix"')"
scripts.publish:ovsx: ovsx publish --packagePath "$(npm pkg get name version | jq -rs '.[0] | "\(.name)-\(.version).vsix"')"
